alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 11:52AM EDT until July 11 at 9:07PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.6 feet on 02/26/1961. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 13.3 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 13.6 Mon 8 pm 13.6 Tue 2 am 13.6 Tue 8 am 11.3 Tue 2 pm 11.3 Tue 8 pm 9.7 Wed 2 am 9.7 Wed 8 am 9.6 Wed 2 pm 9.6 Wed 8 pm 9.6 Thu 2 am 9.5 Thu 8 am 7.0 &&
